content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Meats were really solid, borderline great, but the true hero was the cold noodle soup - probably the best I've ever had tbh. Service was good too even though they were super busy! It was very loud with some mildly weird music stream going on. Will definitely be back! Overall a good fallback when Ahgassi is too busy!
